pr_title: [REST] Apply metadata selector regex on all namespaces

timeline.message:
Change metadata selector

Signed-off-by: Simon Lamon <simonlamon93@hotmail.com>

timeline.author: cweitkamp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -72,19 +63,22 @@ public MetadataSelectorMatcher(final @Reference MetadataRegistry metadataRegistr
                     .map(n -> n.trim()) //
                     .collect(Collectors.toSet());
 
+            Set<String> allMetadataNamespaces = metadataRegistry.getAll().stream() //
+                    .map(metadata -> metadata.getUID().getNamespace()) //
+                    .distinct() //
+                    .collect(Collectors.toSet());

timeline.bodyText: Private property configDescriptionRegistry can be removed completely from this test.
timeline.author: cweitkamp

timeline.bodyText:
We do not need the method mockMetadate(). Can be implemented like this:
       when(metadataRegistry.getAll()).thenReturn(List.of(new Metadata(new MetadataKey("magic", "test_item"), "test", Map.of()), ... ));
timeline.author: cweitkamp
